item.description:
UPCOMING EXHIBITS at the Robert Klein Gallery:
Henry Horenstein, Animalia
February 27 through March 28, 2009

Opening Reception is Feb 27th from 6-8 PM

Henry will be there signing his books and chatting with folks. I personally love Henrys work and just had to see if folks wanted to go in and see the show...

Hope you all can make it!

Donna

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Henry Horenstein Photography Show in Boston at Robert Klein Gallery
